holidays.title: Chulalongkorn Day / Piyamararaj Day
holidays.description: Are you wondering who King Chulalongkorn is and why this day is important? Let’s find out.

holidays.title: Deepavali
holidays.description: Let the light bless our homes and hearts on the auspicious day of Deepavali.

holidays.title: Disarmament Week
holidays.description: If world peace is your mantra or the idea appeals, be a part of the movement.

holidays.title: Diwali
holidays.description: Lasting over five days, the holiday is celebrated by millions of Hindus, Jains and Sikhs worldwide.

holidays.title: Kali Puja
holidays.description: Settle in for a transformative journey into the world of the goddess Kali.

holidays.title: Lakshmi Puja
holidays.description: Chant Lakshmi's mantras to manifest abundance and prosperity in your life!

holidays.title: Naraka Chaturdashi
holidays.description: Indians celebrate the second day of the five-day-long Diwali festival.

holidays.title: National Bologna Day
holidays.description: Everyone’s favorite processed luncheon meat has its own day.

holidays.title: National Elizabeth Day
holidays.description: Today, we honor all Elizabeths and the contributions they have made to our lives.

holidays.title: National Food Day
holidays.description: Explore the world of food production, food safety, farm-animal welfare, hunger prevention, and agriculture.

holidays.title: National Jamaican Jerk Day
holidays.description: Start seasoning with our great tips and information about jerk seasoning and Jamaican culture.

holidays.title: National Kangaroo Awareness Day
holidays.description: Use our fantastic ideas to add a little zing to National Kangaroo Awareness Day.

holidays.title: National Senior UTI Awareness Day
holidays.description: Get informed about U.T.I. symptoms in the elderly with our great information on this day.

holidays.title: New Zealand Labour Day
holidays.description: The rights laborers have today were obtained after a long struggle against exploitative corporations.

holidays.title: United Nations Day
holidays.description: We celebrate the anniversary of the UN Charter of 1945.

holidays.title: World Development Information Day
holidays.description: The younger generation plays a vital role when it comes to strategic development.

holidays.title: World Polio Day
holidays.description: World Polio Day recognizes efforts to diminish and eliminate polio to eradicate it globally.

holidays.title: World Tripe Day
holidays.description: Prepare to savor some delectable, meaty tripe on World Tripe Day!

holidays.title: Zambia Independence Day
holidays.description: True independence and freedom can only exist in doing what’s right — Happy Independence Day Zambia!

holidays.title: Drake’s Birthday
holidays.description: Since his breakout debut, Drake’s been challenging what a rapper and a celebrity should be.

holidays.title: Adrienne Bailon’s Birthday
holidays.description: Sassy, fashionable, successful; what can this inspiring woman not do? Let’s celebrate her today.

holidays.title: CrankGameplays’s Birthday
holidays.description: Known for his cheerful personality, CrankGameplays never fail to entertain fans all over the world!

holidays.title: Daya’s Birthday
holidays.description: With two platinum hits under her belt already, she is just getting warmed up!

holidays.title: Eric Hosmer’s Birthday
holidays.description: Hosmer is in the fifth season of an eight-year, $144 million contract signed with the Padres.

holidays.title: Gabriel Conte’s Birthday
holidays.description: Here’s a closer look at the star! Come celebrate his special day with us!

holidays.title: Jason Tartick’s Birthday
holidays.description: An entrepreneur and internet icon, Tartick truly has the best of both worlds.

holidays.title: Jaylen Brown’s Birthday
holidays.description: Young and energetic — Jaylen Brown is a shining star in the world of basketball!

holidays.title: Justin Burke’s Birthday
holidays.description: Justin Burke’s birthday is today — he can teach you to use your voice with confidence!

holidays.title: Krystal Jung’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let's get to know this K-pop star in more detail as we celebrate her special day.

holidays.title: Monica Arnold’s Birthday
holidays.description: From one song to another, Arnold proved herself as one of the best R&B singers!

holidays.title: PewDiePie’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTube star keeps breaking ground and pushing walls by doing what he loves!

holidays.title: Purpled’s Birthday
holidays.description: At just 18, this popular gamer and Twitch streamer from Virginia has a massive fan base.

holidays.title: Tila Tequila’s Birthday
holidays.description: This reality star has had quite a journey! Read on to find out more!

holidays.title: Wayne Rooney’s Birthday
holidays.description: This English soccer icon has loads of talent and a heart of gold.
